author: smorovic
body:
#### PR description:

* Addition of unit test to verify functionality of DAQ input source, services and output modules in a simple HLT configuration. In addition, HLTRates and DQMHistograms streams are produced.

* DQMFileSaver(PB) configuration in test configurations is updated for 11_1_X changes.

#### PR validation:

New unit tests will be checked by cmsbuild and should pass prior to integrating these changes.
title: Unit test for EventFilter modules (11_1_X)
